content.question: Describe TWO differences in the flash patterns of P. pyralis and P. knulli. Justify the use of differences in flash signal patterns as evidence to support the claim that P. pyralis and P. knulli are different species.

frqParts.text: Describe TWO differences in the flash patterns of P. pyralis and P. knulli. Justify the use of differences in flash signal patterns as evidence to support the claim that P. pyralis and P. knulli are different species.

skill.text: 2.A: Describe characteristics of visual representations of biological concepts and processes.
